response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We understand its significance to you and have tailored our offer accordingly. We are offering the product to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the potential benefits it could bring to you. We are confident that this offer presents an exceptional value proposition and hope to hear your positive response soon. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 950000}
